description: This file defines the OrdersProvider class for managing purchase orders in a Flutter app. It handles data fetching via the PurchasesService, manages loading state, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: OrdersProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the state of purchase orders, including fetching data and tracking loading status.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of orders and updates the internal state, notifying listeners before and after the operation.
